about_the_game:
Story Plot: Before joining the military, your friend asked you to live with his family. He wants you to protect his mother and sister while he's gone. Being unemployed due to COVID-19, you decided to accept his offer since you wouldn’t worry about rent payment anymore.

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:

  • Netori: The MC is in a relationship or more depending on choices. His personalities are also different, from a nice guy to a pervert.

  • Netorase: Unlike the Netori route, the MC decides to share his women.

  • Netorare: The MC will become a simp or even enjoy femdom at the end of the story.

My Friend's Family is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:

  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.

  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.

  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:

  • Pregnancy is optional. When the game reaches the final stage, there will be choices for you to decide to impregnate the women or not.

  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Friend's Family (Captain Kitty).

Since My Friend's Family is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:

  • v0.14: 70% of the expected price.

  • v0.16: 75% of the expected price.

  • v0.18: 80% of the expected price.

  • v0.20: 85% of the expected price.

  • v0.22: 90% of the expected price.

  • v0.24: 95% of the expected price.

  • v0.26: 100% of the expected price.

  • v1.0: 100% of the expected price.

The game will be automatically updated for everyone who has already been owning it. Therefore, the sooner you buy My Friend's Family, the cheaper it is for you!

Thank you for playing My Friend's Family.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!

content_descriptors.notes:
My Friend's Family is an erotic Visual Novel and is intended for adults only. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over. It contains adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, sexual penetrations.
More clarification: sexual assault/non-consensual sex in the game only happens as 'groping'. Rapes and other sexual violence aren't available in the game.
And these 'groping scenes' only happen if the gamers want them. Everything depends on the gamers' choices. Nothing can happen if the gamers don't want to.

detailed_description:
Story Plot: Before joining the military, your friend asked you to live with his family. He wants you to protect his mother and sister while he's gone. Being unemployed due to COVID-19, you decided to accept his offer since you wouldn’t worry about rent payment anymore.

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:

  • Netori: The MC is in a relationship or more depending on choices. His personalities are also different, from a nice guy to a pervert.

  • Netorase: Unlike the Netori route, the MC decides to share his women.

  • Netorare: The MC will become a simp or even enjoy femdom at the end of the story.

My Friend's Family is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:

  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.

  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.

  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:

  • Pregnancy is optional. When the game reaches the final stage, there will be choices for you to decide to impregnate the women or not.

  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Friend's Family (Captain Kitty).

Since My Friend's Family is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:

  • v0.14: 70% of the expected price.

Thank you for playing My Friend's Family.

Regards!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: My Friend's Family (Captain Kitty)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: In My Friend's Family, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Netori Ending), a neutral ending (Netorase Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play.
